## kl infra vpn switch

switch between different vpn devices

### Synopsis

```
This command let switch between different vpn devices.
Example:
  # switch to vpn device
  kl infra vpn switch

	# switch to vpn device with device name
	kl infra vpn switch
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for switch
  -n, --name string   device name
  -h, --help   help for switch
```
